item.title: R to @lexie_henning: I would create and add to an outline that you can change as you go and eventually turn into the thesis.
item.dc:creator: @KaraCooney
item.description: I would create and add to an outline that you can change as you go and eventually turn into the thesis.

item.title:
RT by @KaraCooney: Can we PLEASE stop using stigmatizing language when discussing substance use in neuro/pharmacology??
Reading terms like "opioid addicts" and "marijuana abusers" in a paper published in 2022 is frustrating.
item.dc:creator: @justinrmatheson
item.description:
Can we PLEASE stop using stigmatizing language when discussing substance use in neuro/pharmacology??

Reading terms like "opioid addicts" and "marijuana abusers" in a paper published in 2022 is frustrating.

item.title: RT by @KaraCooney: My heart is breaking for pregnant teens who want abortions in states with no clinics, no judicial bypass, no support, no clear solutions.
item.dc:creator: @aBigMess
item.description: My heart is breaking for pregnant teens who want abortions in states with no clinics, no judicial bypass, no support, no clear solutions.

item.title: RT by @KaraCooney: If 1 male can impregnate 9 female every day for 9 months, 2430 pregnancies. If 1 female can only get pregnant once even if she sleeps with 9 men every day within 9 months, 1 pregnancy. So, Birth control are placed on the wrong gender & science is making pills for the wrong person
item.dc:creator: @mhdksafa
item.description: If 1 male can impregnate 9 female every day for 9 months, 2430 pregnancies. If 1 female can only get pregnant once even if she sleeps with 9 men every day within 9 months, 1 pregnancy. So, Birth control are placed on the wrong gender & science is making pills for the wrong person

item.title: RT by @KaraCooney: Life in America is just hearing white people every year going “Wow, I knew America was messed up, but not THIS messed up!” for the next few decades and then you die
item.dc:creator: @robintran04
item.description: Life in America is just hearing white people every year going “Wow, I knew America was messed up, but not THIS messed up!” for the next few decades and then you die

item.title: RT by @KaraCooney: When he tweeted about Pence, the fighting in the tunnel intensified. We held the line hoping the President would be on our side and send us help. Mike Pence is lucky to be alive, he’s lucky we kept our OATH AND HELD THE LINE. Your boss tried to have you killed. Testify.
item.dc:creator: @SergeantAqGo
item.description: When he tweeted about Pence, the fighting in the tunnel intensified. We held the line hoping the President would be on our side and send us help. Mike Pence is lucky to be alive, he’s lucky we kept our OATH AND HELD THE LINE. Your boss tried to have you killed. Testify.

item.title:
RT by @KaraCooney: This is Osh-Tisch (left) (1854-1929), a warrior, shaman, & artist of the Crow Nation. Osh-Tisch’s name translates to “Finds Them and Kills Them”. She was a Crow badé (also spelled boté & baté), and what is sometimes called a “Two Spirit” person.
Thread
item.dc:creator: @WhoresofYore
item.description:
This is Osh-Tisch (left) (1854-1929), a warrior, shaman, & artist of the Crow Nation. Osh-Tisch’s name translates to “Finds Them and Kills Them”. She was a Crow badé (also spelled boté & baté), and what is sometimes called a “Two Spirit” person.

Thread

item.title:
RT by @KaraCooney: Pennsylvania Republicans are about to force University of Pittsburgh students to pay an extra $12,000 in tuition.
Do not tell me that the Republican Party is not waging a war on youth.
item.dc:creator: @santiagomayer_
item.description:

item.title: RT by @KaraCooney: “The functional problem with originalism is that it requires a very, very firm grasp of history — a grasp that none of the nine justices, and certainly few of their 20-something law clerks, freshly minted from J.D. programs, possess.” https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2022/06/26/conservative-supreme-court-gun-control-00042417

item.title: RT by @KaraCooney: Just incredible that this Trump-Secret Service altercation story is distracting from the major news that Trump knowingly told armed supporters to march on the Capitol — and Meadows spoke to Stone and Flynn the night before January 6. And then wanted a pardon.
item.dc:creator: @hugolowell
item.description: Just incredible that this Trump-Secret Service altercation story is distracting from the major news that Trump knowingly told armed supporters to march on the Capitol — and Meadows spoke to Stone and Flynn the night before January 6. And then wanted a pardon.
